item.description:
EVENT IS AT CAPACITY-

if you ALREADY rsvpd to AARW you have a reservation. If you rsvp'd on this website you do NOT have a reservation!!!

Meet Joanne Chang of Flour Bakery 

Saturday, February 19, 2011, 1:00pm
Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center
38 Ash Street, 5th Floor, Boston

Free and open to the public. RSVP at rsvp@aarw.org
This e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it or 617-426-5313. Copies of Flour will be available f.or purchase and autographing. Snow date March 26.

Sponsored by BCNC and Asian American Resource Workshop.
item.why: NOTE! Event is CLOSED- if you rsvpd to BCNC directly you are on the list but rsvp to THIS site did not reserve a place.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Meet Joanne Chang of Flour Bakery
